eclass:0173-1#02-AAH841#003.title: max. center current
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH841#003.description: maximum spacial expansion of the centre cut

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH918#003.title: number of phases
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH918#003.description: quantitative statement of the given phases

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH880#003.title: min. cutting current
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH880#003.description: specification of the minimum cutting current

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH879#003.title: max. cutting current
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH879#003.description: specification of the maximum cutting current

eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ851#001.title: HS-Code of the WCO
eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ851#001.description: Internationally applied 4 to 6-digit coding of classes of goods as defined by the Harmonized System (HS) of the World Customs Organization (WCO)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ850#002.title: Use of customs tariff number
eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ850#002.description: Indicates what the tariff number is for (for example, import or export)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH835#003.title: max. quality cut
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH835#003.description: quantitative specification of the maximum spacial expansion of the quality cut

eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ849#002.title: Type of customs tariff number
eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ849#002.description: Describes the membership of the tariff number to a specific type in terms of structure and meaning and thus also defines its general context

eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ800#001.title: Customs tariff number
eclass:0173-1#02-AAZ800#001.description: Nomenclature of goods in accordance with a regulation relating to customs tariff and statistical purposes for application to a specific country and / or region. The structure of the customs tariff number is defined by the type otherwise indicated

eclass:0173-1#02-AAY813#001.title: GLN of supplier
eclass:0173-1#02-AAY813#001.description: internationally unique identification number for the supplier of the device or the product and for the physical location

eclass:0173-1#02-AAW336#001.title: Supplier product type
eclass:0173-1#02-AAW336#001.description: Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH977#005.title: remote control present
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH977#005.description: specification whether the device is equipped with a remote control

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH968#005.title: automation interface present
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH968#005.description: specification whether the device is equipped with an automation interface

eclass:0173-1#02-AAI018#005.title: water cooling present
eclass:0173-1#02-AAI018#005.description: specification whether a water cooling exists

eclass:0173-1#02-BAA018#007.title: length
eclass:0173-1#02-BAA018#007.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to diameter/height/width/depth

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH940#005.title: power adjustment
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH940#005.description: information about the possibility to adjust the electric initial effective power

eclass:0173-1#02-AAI019#004.title: water cooling retrofittable
eclass:0173-1#02-AAI019#004.description: specification whether water cooling can be retrofitted

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH878#004.title: cutting current (at 60% ED/40°C)
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH878#004.description: percentage specification of the permitted operating interval of an operating medium at the specified cutting current after an obligatory rest period

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH877#004.title: cutting current (at 40% ED/40°C)
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH877#004.description: percentage specification of the permitted operating interval of an operating medium at the specified cutting current after an obligatory rest period

eclass:0173-1#02-BAA020#010.title: height
eclass:0173-1#02-BAA020#010.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to diameter/length/width/depth

eclass:0173-1#02-BAI088#004.title: empty weight
eclass:0173-1#02-BAI088#004.description: mass of the object without add-on part and operating materials

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH770#004.title: fuse (time lag)
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH770#004.description: specification of the amperage of the overcurrent protection device. A fuse is action-delayed if the amperage can be over the maximum allowed value for a short time without reacting

eclass:0173-1#02-BAF016#006.title: width
eclass:0173-1#02-BAF016#006.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to height/ length/depth

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH876#004.title: cutting current (at 35% ED/40°C)
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH876#004.description: percentage specification of the permitted operating interval of an operating medium at the specified cutting current after an obligatory rest period

eclass:0173-1#02-AAH875#004.title: cutting current (at 100% ED/40°C)
eclass:0173-1#02-AAH875#004.description: percentage specification of the permitted operating interval of an operating medium at the specified cutting current after an obligatory rest period

eclass:0173-1#02-AAQ326#002.title: address of additional link
eclass:0173-1#02-AAQ326#002.description: web site address where information about the product or contact is given

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU733#001.title: Manufacturer product order suffix
eclass:0173-1#02-AAU733#001.description: By the manufacturer awarded string for the identification of additional attributes, not by a structured manufacturer item number may be expressed

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO742#002.title: Brand
eclass:0173-1#02-AAO742#002.description: Part of the naming for the support and the recognition of the brand position of products and services consisting of words, numbers, letters or other characters. Registered brands and trademarks are indicated with the appropriate protective signs (® or TM)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU731#001.title: Manufacturer product family
eclass:0173-1#02-AAU731#001.description: 2nd level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU732#001.description: Top level of a 3 level manufacturer specific product hierarchy

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO676#003.description: unique product identifier of the manufacturer

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU734#001.description: Description of the product, it's technical features and implementation if needed (long text)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU728#001.description: 2nd level of a 3 level supplier specific product hierarchy

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU730#001.description: Description of the product, it's technical features and implementation if needed (long text)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAW337#001.description: By the supplier awarded string for the identification of additional attributes, not by a structured supplier item number may be expressed

eclass:0173-1#02-AAU729#001.title: Supplier product root
eclass:0173-1#02-AAU729#001.description: Top level of a 3 level supplier specific product hierarchy

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO736#004.description: unique product order identifier of the supplier

eclass:0173-1#02-AAM551#002.title: Supplier product designation
eclass:0173-1#02-AAM551#002.description: Short description of the product (short text)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO735#003.title: name of supplier
eclass:0173-1#02-AAO735#003.description: name of supplier which provides the customer with a product or a service

eclass:0173-1#02-ABA669#001.title: URI of manufacturer
eclass:0173-1#02-ABA669#001.description: fully qualified domain name of the manufacturer of a product using a universal resource identifier (URI)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO057#002.title: Product type
eclass:0173-1#02-AAO057#002.description: Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants

eclass:0173-1#02-AAW338#001.title: Manufacturer product designation
eclass:0173-1#02-AAW338#001.description: Short description of the product (short text)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAY812#001.title: GLN of manufacturer
eclass:0173-1#02-AAY812#001.description: internationally unique identification number for the manufacturer of the device or the product and for the physical location

eclass:0173-1#02-ABH173#001.title: URI of the product
eclass:0173-1#02-ABH173#001.description: unique global identification of the product using an universal resource identifier (URI)

eclass:0173-1#02-AAO677#002.title: Manufacturer name
eclass:0173-1#02-AAO677#002.description: legally valid designation of the natural or judicial person which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into circulation
